Name: cloud-connect-aws/CreateOrUpdateAWSSettings
Description: Create or update Global Settings which are applicable to all provisioned AWS accounts

Parameters.Name: cloudtrail_bucket_owner_id
Parameters.Description: The 12 digit AWS account which is hosting the centralized S3 bucket of containing cloudtrail logs from multiple accounts.

Parameters.Name: static_external_id
Parameters.Description: By setting this value, all subsequent accounts that are provisioned will default to using this value as their external ID.

Name: cloud-connect-aws/DeleteAWSAccounts
Description: Delete a set of AWS Accounts by specifying their IDs

Parameters.Name: ids
Parameters.Description: One or more AWS account identifiers

Name: cloud-connect-aws/GetAWSAccounts
Description: List AWS Accounts

Parameters.Name: ids
Parameters.Description: One or more AWS account identifiers

Name: cloud-connect-aws/GetAWSSettings
Description: Retrieve a set of Global Settings which are applicable to all provisioned AWS accounts

Name: cloud-connect-aws/ProvisionAWSAccounts
Description: Provision AWS Accounts by specifying details about the accounts to provision

Parameters.Name: mode
Parameters.Description: Provisioning mode

Parameters.Name: cloudtrail_bucket_owner_id
Parameters.Description: The 12 digit AWS account which is hosting the S3 bucket containing cloudtrail logs for this account. If this field is set, it takes precedence of the settings level field.

Parameters.Name: cloudtrail_bucket_region
Parameters.Description: Region where the S3 bucket containing cloudtrail logs resides.

Parameters.Name: external_id
Parameters.Description: ID assigned for use with cross account IAM role access.

Parameters.Name: iam_role_arn
Parameters.Description: The full arn of the IAM role created in this account to control access.

Parameters.Name: id
Parameters.Description: 12 digit AWS provided unique identifier for the account.

Parameters.Name: rate_limit_reqs
Parameters.Description: Rate limiting setting to control the maximum number of requests that can be made within the rate_limit_time threshold.

Parameters.Name: rate_limit_time
Parameters.Description: Rate limiting setting to control the number of seconds for which -RateLimitReqs applies.

Name: cloud-connect-aws/QueryAWSAccounts
Description: Search for provisioned AWS Accounts by providing an FQL filter and paging details. Returns a set of AWS accounts which match the filter criteria

Parameters.Name: limit
Parameters.Description: Maximum number of results per request

Name: cloud-connect-aws/QueryAWSAccountsForIDs
Description: Search for provisioned AWS Accounts by providing an FQL filter and paging details. Returns a set of AWS account IDs which match the filter criteria

Parameters.Name: limit
Parameters.Description: Maximum number of results per request

Name: cloud-connect-aws/UpdateAWSAccounts
Description: Update AWS Accounts by specifying the ID of the account and details to update

Parameters.Name: cloudtrail_bucket_owner_id
Parameters.Description: The 12 digit AWS account which is hosting the S3 bucket containing cloudtrail logs for this account. If this field is set, it takes precedence of the settings level field.

Parameters.Name: cloudtrail_bucket_region
Parameters.Description: Region where the S3 bucket containing cloudtrail logs resides.

Parameters.Name: external_id
Parameters.Description: ID assigned for use with cross account IAM role access.

Parameters.Name: iam_role_arn
Parameters.Description: The full arn of the IAM role created in this account to control access.

Parameters.Name: id
Parameters.Description: 12 digit AWS provided unique identifier for the account.

Parameters.Name: rate_limit_reqs
Parameters.Description: Rate limiting setting to control the maximum number of requests that can be made within the rate_limit_time threshold.

Parameters.Name: rate_limit_time
Parameters.Description: Rate limiting setting to control the number of seconds for which -RateLimitReqs applies.

Parameters.Name: ids

Parameters.Description: Flag whether the sample should be zipped and password protected with pass='infected'

Parameters.Name: body
Parameters.Description: Path to the file

Parameters.Description: Filename

Name: sample-uploads/DeleteSampleV3
Description: Removes a sample, including file, meta and submissions from the collection

Parameters.Name: X-CS-USERUUID
Parameters.Description: User UUID

Parameters.Name: ids
Parameters.Description: The file SHA256.

Name: sample-uploads/UploadSampleV3
Description: Upload a file for further cloud analysis. After uploading, call the specific analysis API endpoint.

Parameters.Name: X-CS-USERUUID
Parameters.Description: User UUID

Parameters.Name: upfile
Parameters.Description: The binary file.

Parameters.Name: file_name
Parameters.Description: Name of the file.

Parameters.Name: comment
Parameters.Description: A descriptive comment to identify the file for other users.

Parameters.Name: is_confidential
Parameters.Description:
Defines visibility of this file in Falcon MalQuery, either via the API or the Falcon console.

- `true`: File is only shown to users within your customer account
- `false`: File can be seen by other CrowdStrike customers 

Default: `true`.

Name: scanner/GetScans
Description: Check the status of a volume scan. Time required for analysis increases with the number of samples in a volume but usually it should take less than 1 minute

Parameters.Name: ids
Parameters.Description: One or more volume scan identifiers

Name: scanner/QuerySubmissions
Description: Find IDs for submitted scans by providing an FQL filter and paging details. Returns a set of volume IDs that match your criteria.

Name: scanner/ScanSamples
Description: Submit a volume of files for ml scanning. Time required for analysis increases with the number of samples in a volume but usually it should take less than 1 minute

Parameters.Name: samples
Parameters.Description: One or more SHA256 hash values to submit as a volume scan

Name: scripts/GetQueue
Description: Create a report of with status of queued Real-time Response sessions

Parameters.Description: Number of days worth of results to retrieve [Default: 7]

Name: scripts/InvokeDeploy
Description: Deploy and run an executable using Real-time Response

Parameters.Description: One or more Host identifiers
Path to the executable
Command line arguments to include upon execution
Length of time to wait for a result, in seconds
Add session to the offline queue if the host does not initialize

Name: scripts/InvokeRTR
Description: Start a session, execute a Real-time Response command and output results

Parameters.Description: Command to execute
One or more host identifiers
Length of time to wait for a result, in seconds
Add sessions in this batch to the offline queue if the hosts do not initialize
